```{r}
TLFB <- read.csv2("/Users/Ofix/Documents/Fac/internat/Recherche/projets/synchro/synchroData/CSV/psychometry/TLFB_INCANT.csv")
```

With the graphs below, I chose : F1002+++, F1073+++, F1069++ and F1101++

I excluded F2010, F2013 since the configuration was too poor (overlapping subjects).
```{r}
plot <- FALSE
for (i in 1:length(TLFB$Case)){
  v <- as.numeric(as.vector(TLFB[i,c(25:29)]))
    print(paste (TLFB$Case[i], "below"))
    plot(v, type="l", col=rainbow(length(TLFB$Case))[i])}
```
